about_the_game:
The Espionage Demo is a cross-platform episodic puzzle game. Set in the alternate history of World War II, the player will take on the role of a spy who grows into a true warrior in a series of revolutionary missions.

This Demo will contain:
- Prologue plot content
- Core gameplay
- Partial puzzle content
- 9 game levels
- Game length of 30~60 minutes

Unique Theme


Based on alternate history of the German World War II reality and infused with the high-pressure political world of "1984," conveying themes of love and peace.

Historical Gameplay


You will immerse yourself in the era's upheavals, encounter historical figures, and through actions such as negotiation and assassination, influence key personalities, altering the course of history and scripting a new chapter.

In this game, you can experience thrilling espionage operations and also feel the warmth of ordinary people under the dust of the era.
The game is filled with many era-specific Easter eggs, reflecting real historical vignettes and the spirit of the times.

Stylistic Gameplay


Highly unique art, cinematic visuals, and hand-painted illustrations with a rich texture style.

The game pursues the vividness of Western colors while encompassing the subtlety of Eastern aesthetics, presenting a distinctive style.

Story-driven Gameplay


This is a premeditated murder, a drama buried beneath the ruins of history, with various characters taking the stage amidst the tide of the times.

You will follow the protagonist's footsteps, starting as an ordinary person, executing multiple espionage tasks, evolving into a true anti-dictatorship warrior, gradually uncovering the historical truth, concealing the conflict between faith and desire within the sudden and massive fire ten years ago.
The clever narrative structure makes the mystery intricate, presenting the truth like a mirage, sometimes seemingly close, yet suddenly distant.

Character-driven Gameplay


Each person is a true reflection of the historical tide, both the dust of the era and the protagonist of the story.

Players can establish connections with key characters in the game, interact, communicate, influence favorability, and even change the course of key plots, unlocking new storylines.

Puzzle Gameplay


Puzzle design is just right, not overly difficult, but fitting for the plot and rich in challenge.

Narrative delineates puzzles, and puzzles drive the plot, intertwining and complementing each other.
